body:
## What's Changed
* ci: test against the currently supported python versions by @raddessi in https://github.com/netbox-community/pynetbox/pull/446
* Fix pickling exception with custom errors by @kingtong in https://github.com/netbox-community/pynetbox/pull/459

## New Contributors
* @kingtong made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbox-community/pynetbox/pull/459

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/netbox-community/pynetbox/compare/v6.6.1...v6.6.2

## What's Changed
* ci: update the versions of netbox in the test suite by @raddessi in https://github.com/netbox-community/pynetbox/pull/444
* Use devices as variable for example calls to nb.dcim.devices by @berendt in https://github.com/netbox-community/pynetbox/pull/445
* Fixes #447: Remove extra self argument in Vlans.__str__() by @markkuleinio in https://github.com/netbox-community/pynetbox/pull/448

## New Contributors
* @berendt made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbox-community/pynetbox/pull/445

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/netbox-community/pynetbox/compare/v6.6.0...v6.6.1

## What's Changed
* Upgrade Black to the first non-beta release by @markkuleinio in https://github.com/netbox-community/pynetbox/pull/441
* Fix `VirtualChassis.__str__()`, make `VirtualChassis.master` a `Devices` object by @markkuleinio in https://github.com/netbox-community/pynetbox/pull/439


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/netbox-community/pynetbox/compare/v6.5.0...v6.6.0

## What's Changed
* Docstring updates: remove `secrets` from examples by @markkuleinio in https://github.com/netbox-community/pynetbox/pull/432
* Fixes #427: Adds support for `available-vlans` child endpoint for VLAN groups by @markkuleinio in https://github.com/netbox-community/pynetbox/pull/428


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/netbox-community/pynetbox/compare/v6.4.1...v6.5.0

## What's Changed
* Fixes #422: Adds support for HTTP 409 when allocation is unsuccessful by @markkuleinio in https://github.com/netbox-community/pynetbox/pull/423
* Set ObjectChanges.postchange_data and .prechange_data to JsonField by @markkuleinio in https://github.com/netbox-community/pynetbox/pull/424


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/netbox-community/pynetbox/compare/v6.4.0...v6.4.1

## What's Changed
* Use `display` field in `Record.__str__()` to support future models by @markkuleinio in https://github.com/netbox-community/pynetbox/pull/419
* Update docstrings for DetailEndpoint and Prefixes.available_* by @markkuleinio in https://github.com/netbox-community/pynetbox/pull/421
* Add wireless app (for NetBox 3.1+) by @markkuleinio in https://github.com/netbox-community/pynetbox/pull/420


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/netbox-community/pynetbox/compare/v6.3.0...v6.4.0

name: v6.3.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Handle list results in DetailEndpoint.create() (fixes #395) by @markkuleinio in https://github.com/netbox-community/pynetbox/pull/418
* Define Permissions.constraints as JSON field to fix #398 by @markkuleinio in https://github.com/netbox-community/pynetbox/pull/416
* Fixes manual pagination (#412) and argless filter (#386) by @steffenschumacher in https://github.com/netbox-community/pynetbox/pull/413
**Makes `.filter()` with no args equivalent to `.all()`, 7.0 will remove the latter.** 
* Add Api.create_token() (for NetBox 3.0+) by @markkuleinio in https://github.com/netbox-community/pynetbox/pull/415
* Add custom model name lookup to fix #389 by @markkuleinio in https://github.com/netbox-community/pynetbox/pull/390


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/netbox-community/pynetbox/compare/v6.2.0...v6.3.0

## What's Changed
* Fixes #316 bulk update/delete on both Endpoint and RecordSet by @steffenschumacher in https://github.com/netbox-community/pynetbox/pull/409

## New Contributors
* @steffenschumacher made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbox-community/pynetbox/pull/409

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/netbox-community/pynetbox/compare/v6.1.3...v6.2.0
Adds dash-separated plugin endpoint name support (#332 Thanks @dvaccarosenna)
* Fixes issue giving `Endpoint.create()` a list of dicts (#370).

* Fixes issue with duplicate returns when threading is enabled (#364).
* Fixes updates to config_context data (#365).
* Re-implements ValueError from Endpoint.get() when used with kwargs and more than one result is found (#366).
* Adds a `__next__` method to `RecordSet` objects (#358 - thanks @jqueuniet)
* Fix len() calls for empty RecordSet (#359 - Thanks @jqueuniet)
* Fixes broken DetailEndpoint.list() (#352)

* **BREAKING CHANGE** `Endpoint.all()` and `.filter()` no longer return lists, instead they return a `ReturnSet` object now. Iterating over this object calls a generator which steps through paginated results now as-needed.
* `Endpoint.all()` and `.filter()` now accept a `limit` kwarg that controls the page size of paginated results.
* Fixes issue pickling responses from `Endpoint.all()` and `.filter() (#331, thanks again @markkuleinio).
* Implemented integration tests against four previous major NetBox releases (thanks @raddessi).
* Ends python 2 support.
Fixes URL on requests to plugins endpoints (#302).
* Improves on `Record._endpoint_from_url()`'s path parsing to avoid URL format issues. #323
* Fixes tests. #319 (Thanks @ignatenkobrain)

* Adds support for the `/dcim/interfaces/:id/trace` endpoint via the `.trace()` method on an interface record. #280 (Thanks @raddessi)
* Add support for `/api/users/` endpoints in NetBox 2.9+. #313 (Thanks @markkuleinio)
* Add Api.status() to be used with NetBox 2.10.0+. #314 (Thanks @markkuleinio)
* Fixes bug in `Endpoint.get()` to return None when a non-existent object is queried by ID. #292 (Thanks @Dimaqa)
Fixes issue saving tags on NetBox 2.9+ instances (#311)
* Fixes bug with where URL was mangled calling `.save()` (#304)
* Add Basic plugins support (#290).
* Fixes malformed URL when calling `.save()` and `.delete()` on nested objects. (#287)
* Fixes issue when calling attributes by their dict keys where we only returned the key's name instead of its value. (#282 - Thanks @vincentbernat)
* Fixes issue with unchanged tags being reordered when .save() is called that caused unnecessary updates to NetBox. (#271)
* Fixes issue saving `local_config_context` attribute on objects (#266 - Thanks @markkuleinio)
* Fixes issue with threads overwriting `Request.filters`. (#263 - thanks @weisdd and @markkuleinio)
* Fixes `Api.get_version()` to use the session object. (#261)
Publish to pypi with github-actions.

* Fixes #240 by adding an `Api.openapi()` method that returns a dictionary of the entire OpenAPI spec.

## Breaking Changes
* Fixes #239, #229, #219, #209, #189, and #166 by allowing `Api.http_session` to be overridden by user-supplied custom `requests.Session()` objects to more precisely control certain requests behavior. While this was possible before, it wasn't applied to all requests. For example, getting session keys was done in `Api().__init__()` which wouldn't respect a custom http_session. This behavior has been changed and will now only occur when the secrets endpoint is called.
**Note:** _this change removes the `ssl_verify` kwarg passed to `.api()` that controlled certificate validation in previous versions. Please see the docs for the new method._
* Fixes #241 where the same objects failed equality tests if one was derived from a nested object on a different endpoint (thanks @jsenecal).
* Fixes an inconsistency noted in #224 by making `Endpoint.get()` and `Endpoint.filter()` behave similarly (return None) when the resource isn't found.
* Fixes #144 by returning proper objects from `.create()` on detail endpoint routes like `available-ips` and `available-prefixes`.
Re-release of 4.3.2 that wasn't published to pypi.
* Adds support for the rack elevation endpoint in NetBox 2.8 (#238).
* Makes `config_contex` on virtualization record objects a JsonField. (PR #227)
* Adds the ability to thread calls to NetBox from `.filter()` and `.all()` methods. (PR #216)
* save() is not idempotent when dealing with choice objects from NetBox 2.7 (PR #223).
- Previously if save() or delete() were called on nested records the URL called would be that of the parent (#161 &#212). PR #214 fixes this issue.
* Fixes issues with hashing Record objects by adding name attribute to Endpoint and `__eq__` method to Record objects to facilitate comparison. (PR #210)
* Fixes infinite loop when filtering with paginated results. (PR #207)

* Fix discrepancy in `DetailEndpoint.create()` and the docs where calling w/o arguments resulted in an exception. ( PR #192).
* Add method to return custom choices. (PR #201)
* Fixes URL in get_session_key (PR #202)
* Fix Endpoint.choices() by assigning http_session. (PR #199)

* Makes use of session in requests (PR #148)
* Adds `Api.version` property to query the NetBox version (PR #187)
* Adds `.choices()` method to endpoint objects that utilizes DRF's OPTIONS method for discovering available choices for fields that use it. This method will eventually replace `App.choices()` when NetBox retires the `/_choices` endpoint. (PR #183)
* Adds count() method to Endpoint object. (PR #193)
* Use requests params to form URL parameters. (PR #194)
* Creates a custom model for ChangeObjects and sets its `__str__` to `request_id`. (PR #195)
* Implements `__hash__` method on Record. (PR #196)
* Implements JsonField object. (PR #197)
* Adds `local_context_data` field to device model as dict. (PR #197)
#165 - Returns ContentError when 2XX response but not JSON.

# Bug Fixes
* [#156](https://github.com/digitalocean/pynetbox/issues/156) - Returns AllocationError when NetBox responds with a 204 to Allocation requests (Thanks @markkuleinio).
*  [#152](https://github.com/digitalocean/pynetbox/issues/152) - Makes App object pickleable  (Thanks @xtelinco and @kartiksubbarao for testing).

name: v4.0.6 (2018-12-29)
body:
## Bug Fixes
* [#137](https://github.com/digitalocean/pynetbox/issues/137) - Fixes behavior where appending an existing VLAN object id to tagged_vlans would cause .save() to still trigger a PATCH operation.

name: v4.0.5 (2018-12-14)
body:
## Bug Fixes
* [#132](https://github.com/digitalocean/pynetbox/pull/132) - Fixes list comparison issue in `Record._diff`. 
* [#134](https://github.com/digitalocean/pynetbox/issues/134) - Returns None from Endpoint.get() when no items are found instead of empty list from `.filter()`.

name: v4.0.4
body:
v4.0.4 (2018-12-07)

## Bug Fixes
* Fixes IndexError introduced by fix for #127 when field is empty list.

name: v4.0.3
body:
v4.0.3 (2018-12-07)

## Bug Fixes
* [#127](https://github.com/digitalocean/pynetbox/issues/127) - Fixes `__iter__` method on Record object so that it properly returns lists of record objects. Like tagged_vlans on for Interfaces.

name: v4.0.2
body:
v4.0.2 (2018-12-06)

## Bug Fixes
* [#126](https://github.com/digitalocean/pynetbox/issues/126) - Fixes TypeError when calling save on interfaces Record with tagged_vlans.

name: v4.0.1
body:
v4.0.1 (2018-12-06)

## Bug Fixes
* [#122](https://github.com/digitalocean/pynetbox/issues/122) - Adds missing authentication credentials for `.choices()`.

name: v4.0.0
body:
v4.0.0 (2018-12-04)

## Enhancements

* [#109](https://github.com/digitalocean/pynetbox/issues/109) - Clean up tests a bit.
* Added cable endpoint support coming in NetBox 2.5.
* Added some detail to the ValueError raised when `.get()` returns more than one object.
* Added reserved kwargs to `.get()` and `.filter()` ("id", "pk", "limit", "offset").
* Made RequestError more verbose when the NetBox API returns a json response. Also added more details when a 404 is returned (e.g. misspelled endpoints). 

## API Changes

* [#22](https://github.com/digitalocean/pynetbox/issues/22) - Switch to using PATCH instead of PUTs for updates. Also added an `.update()` method to Response objects that takes a dictionary to update multiple values on the object.
* [#24](https://github.com/digitalocean/pynetbox/issues/24) - Add basic support for the `_choices` endpoint on each app by adding a `choices()` method to the App object.
* [#108](https://github.com/digitalocean/pynetbox/issues/108) - Return `Record` objects from `.create()`.

## Bug Fixes

* [#88](https://github.com/digitalocean/pynetbox/issues/88) - Raise an exception now if `.filter()` is passed no kwargs.
* [#90](https://github.com/digitalocean/pynetbox/issues/90) - Fixes some miscellaneous issues related to converting certain Record object's fields into netaddr.IPNetwork objects. That feature has been removed and it simply return strings now.

name: v4.0.0-rc.1
body:
v4.0.0 (2018-12-04)

## Enhancements

* [#109](https://github.com/digitalocean/pynetbox/issues/109) - Clean up tests a bit.
* Added cable endpoint support coming in NetBox 2.5.
* Added some detail to the ValueError raised when `.get()` returns more than one object.
* Added reserved kwargs to `.get()` and `.filter()` ("id", "pk", "limit", "offset").
* Made RequestError more verbose when the NetBox API returns a json response. Also added more details when a 404 is returned (e.g. misspelled endpoints). 

## API Changes

* [#22](https://github.com/digitalocean/pynetbox/issues/22) - Switch to using PATCH instead of PUTs for updates. Also added an `.update()` method to Response objects that takes a dictionary to update multiple values on the object.
* [#24](https://github.com/digitalocean/pynetbox/issues/24) - Add basic support for the `_choices` endpoint on each app by adding a `choices()` method to the App object.
* [#108](https://github.com/digitalocean/pynetbox/issues/108) - Return `Record` objects from `.create()`.

## Bug Fixes

* [#88](https://github.com/digitalocean/pynetbox/issues/88) - Raise an exception now if `.filter()` is passed no kwargs.
* [#90](https://github.com/digitalocean/pynetbox/issues/90) - Fixes some miscellaneous issues related to converting certain Record object's fields into netaddr.IPNetwork objects. That feature has been removed and it simply return strings now.

name: v3.4.11
body: Fixes #119

name: v3.4.10
body: * Should _actually_ fix idempotent tags (#94) now.

name: v3.4.9
body: * Fixes #94 where users were unable to use `.append()` to add a tag. This converts tag lists to a set and back to a list when `serialize()` is called so we don't send an update when we append a tag that's already there.

name: v3.4.8
body:
* Fixes #106 by adding a `units` DetailEndpoint onto the Racks object that lets users get the devices in a rack. Calling `netbox.dcim.racks.get(x).units.list()` will return a list of `RU` objects that have a `device` attribute populated with a Record object of the device in that RU. 

* Fixes #110 in serializer that failed to handle tagged_vlans field correctly. This also added the ability for objects stored in lists to be turned into Record objects requested in #92

name: v3.4.7
body: * Fixes memory leak in `endpoints.filter()` by getting rid of unused `CACHE` variable. Thanks @abringenberg (#97)

name: v3.4.6
body: * Fixes issue with the values of `data` and `config_context` being turned into `Record` objects instead of remaining dicts. (#87)

name: v3.4.5
body:
* Fixes issue with IPRecord object throwing a ValueError when trying to turn a string containing slashes in it into an IPNetwork object. (#83)
* Adds custom IPRecord object for Circuit Terminations with a string representation of the underlying circuit ID. (#79)

name: v3.4.4
body:
* Fixes issue with prefix and aggregate records not being idempotent. (#73)
* Adds str and repr methods for Circuit Records so that `.cid` is displayed by default.

name: v3.4.3
body: * Fixes issue with how non-ascii characters are handled in NetBox returns (#60).

name: v3.4.2
body:
* Fixes serialization issue with selection type custom fields (#70).
* Remove unused dependency (#69).
* Should fix issue introduced by switching to setuptools_scm for versioning (#67).

* Adds the ability to toggle SSL verification (#41). Thanks @explody.
* Sanitizes URL by removing a trailing front slash if it's present in the url passed at instantiation (#61).
* Moves to setuptools_scm for versioning.

name: v3.3.1
body: * Fixes issue with special characters while building the URL. (#52) Thanks @mchrobak.

name: v3.3.0
body: * Adds support for napalm detail endpoint (#45).
Fixes #42 - Adds VirtualMachines object that properly handles `primary_(ip|ip4|ip6)` attributes.

* Adds proper support for `virtual-chassis` endpoint. Thanks @lamiskin (PR #37)
* Fixes issue with calling attributes with `None` value on `Record` objects after `.full_details()` has run. (Issue #36)
* Adds example in docs for `RequestError` exceptions (Issue #28)

### Maintenance Release

Fixes #32 - Thanks @funzoneq
* Incorporates fixes in #18

name: v3.0.0
body:
## Change Log
* Added python3 support (#3, #11).
* Virtualization support was added (#14).
* Added `available-ips` as a property of `Prefix` objects (#16). 
* `available-prefixes` was also added to `Prefix` objects, and behaves similarly to `available-ips`

## API Changes
* `Endpoint.create()` & `DetailEndpoint.create()` now return the entire response from NetBox instead of just the `id`.
* `Endpoint.bulk_create()` was removed in favor of passing `.create()` a list of dictionaries as a positional arg. This passes the list as-is and takes advantage of NetBox's (v2.3+) bulk creation capabilities.
